overview:
Michael Mills is trained in cognitive science with 20-year track record of innovation and accomplishment in real-world product design, user studies, research and teaching.

Combines hands-on skills in rapid prototyping and product visualization with creative leadership, management and teaching. Professional experience includes user experience architect at Intuit, Director of User Experience Digital Home and Advance Products, Yahoo!, Director of Design and adjunct professor at Stanford, Senior Interaction Designer at Stanford, Principal Scientist and QuickTime founding father at Apple, tenured faculty at NYU Interactive Telecommunications Program.
